__e: The Enterprise encountered a probe that had been sent from the planet before it was destroyed.
A probe that finds me in the future.
Klingon vessel, we know what you are doing, and we will destroy any probe launched toward the Veridian star.
I do not have a probe in my ear.
And then they stuck a probe in my stomach.
You'll never get that anal probe near me!
- The probe is still with us, sir.
It'll take a few hours to make the adjustments.
Or it could be exactly what it said.
